trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A>para determinar quais eventos está ocorrendo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você manipule vários tipos de evento com um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Use as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>Propriedades para determinar qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>que o evento está ocorrendo loop for</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> e</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel a tab change in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar uma alteração de guia em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade da instância recém-criado são inicializados com os valores de parâmetro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> o evento está ocorrendo para.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do `tabPage` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the tab change by default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para cancelar a alteração de guia por padrão. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica qual evento está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> o evento está ocorrendo para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> o evento está ocorrendo para.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de base zero de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>
